1121312212222122111211111111111111121.title: You decided to take a shower before going to th...

11213122122221221112111111111111111211.content:
"Mark Henderson?"
You looked up as the nurse called your name. "Follow me please" she added. She shook your hand, then led you down the corridor and pointed to a room. "The doctor will be here in a minute" she said, and left. You felt kind of set at ease that she wasn't to be staying there with you.

You sat down while waiting for someone to walk through the door. So many thoughts had crossed your mind on your way here that now that you were actually at the hospital you felt too nervous to think at all.

"Mr. Henderson?" a voice came from outside the door. A black man in his mid 30's stood by the door. "I'm Dr. John Williams" he said as he entered the room. He seemed friendly and outgoing. "Hi" you said as you shook his hand. "So what can I do for you Mr. Henderson?" he said while closing the door. You didn't really know where to begin. "Take it easy, there's no reason to be embarassed. Remember that this is my job", the doctor continued, as if he had read your facial expressions.

You forced a brief smile and continued "I have a problem. Around three days ago I experienced some.. changes". The doctor listened patiently. "What kind of changes?" he said. "I uhm.. I think I started becoming gradually more feminine over the course of an afternoon, until I became a girl" you said, knowing how silly this came out. You would like to explain it further, but to be honest you didn't even remember exactly how it started. "Well excuse me Mr. Henderson, but you look like a boy to me" the doctor replied, a little confused. "The changes are limited to the lower half of my body" you said.

Dr. Williams seemed a bit sceptical at this, probably thinking this was more something related to the field of psychology. It was however his job, so he continued asking questions. "Mr. Henderson, it is possible through the help of hormones to gradually become more feminized. It is not however possible to experience these changes all in one afternoon. What kind of changes are we talking about here?"

"I haven't taken any hormones" you said, firmly. "I went to school like any other day, but after a few hours I felt odd. I found that both my legs, my bum and.. my genitals, had become female".

"Alright Mr. Henderson, would you be so kind as to remove your pants so I could see for myself?" the doctor said. You got off the bench and did as he said.
The doctor looked a bit taken aback. This was unlike anything he had ever seen before.

"And.. you are quite sure these changes occured only three days ago?"
"Yes, quite sure" you said, sarcastically.
11213122122221221112111111111111111211.title: At the hospital

112131221222212211121111111111111112111.content:
The doctor laughed. "Yeah I suppose you if anyone would know" he said. He had your medical information available, so no doubt he could check that you were in fact born a male. "This is unlike anything I've seen, so I don't really know where to start, but I think we should check your hormone levels" he then added.

You later took two bloodsamples, one in your arm and one in your leg. If you were female from the waist down, it would be good to know if your hormone-levels were different. Most likely you had been getting increased levels of female hormones, which would probably cause changes to your upper body in time as well. This, the doctor didn't tell you. He most likely felt you were nervous enough as it is.

"While I go get these analyzed in the lab-" he said, "I would like to ask you to do something that you would percieve as a bit awkward" he said. You looked puzzled. "I'd like to send you down to the gynecologist department for a closer look at how extensive these changes are" he then added.
112131221222212211121111111111111112111.title: Continue

You felt so humiliated right now. "I can understand how you're feeling right now, Mr. Henderson. I assure you this is for your own good". You agreed. You weren't a doctor, and you came here to get answers. "It's downstairs through the corridor to your left. Sit in the waiting room until your name is called. I'll call Dr. Jensen and let her know that you're coming"

You sighed in relief at the fact that he didn't send you to a male gynecologist. As the doctor left the room to get the bloodsamples down to the lab you proceeded down the staircase and sat in the waitingroom. You felt lucky that you were the only one there. Being the only guy waiting to be called in to the gynecologist would be super embarassing, especially if you had met someone you knew. You only had to sit for around five minutes before someone opened the door and said "Mark Henderson? Please come in".

This doctor was quite young, probably graduated medical school not too long ago. She was actually looking quite good. "You can sit down" she said while giving a smile. "I don't want this to be awkward for you" she said. "Believe me, it will be" you said, and laughed a little nervously as you took a seat. "I'm actually a bit curious about this" she said. She asked you to put your legs up on those things that spreads your legs. You had no view over your area yourself, since it was covered by a sheet of paper. As your pants were removed, she seemed surprised. Being a gynecologist she spent her days doing this, but this had most likely been the first boy she investigated. "So have you experienced any pain or abnormalities?" she said. "No, no pain" you replied, - "But this whole thing feels like an abnormality" you added.

She laughed. "I can imagine. So how does it feel to have a vagina now?" she said. "It's very different. I've tried to avoid looking too much or feeling too much" you then said. 1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: You go to the gynecologist

This thought hadn't really crossed your mind. You were aware of that you were a guy who suddenly had a girl's anatomy, and that was why you were here in the first place. You hadn't however given much thought that because of it, you were a guy who check out how much "naked girls" as you could possibly want, atleast till things went back to normal.

There was a knock on the door. Dr. Jensen said "Come in" as Dr. Williams entered.
- Are you done?" he asked.
- Yes, we just finished up.
- And?
- He possess everything a normal girl does. As far as his anatomy goes, he is completely female. No trace of manhood as far as I can see.

Now he turned to you. "We've analyzed both of the bloodsamples, and I care to say that it is unlike anything we've ever seen. The sample from your arm shows that your upper body has high levels of testosterone, which is normal for a boy your age. The one from your leg however shows the same amount of estrogen in your lower body, which instead is normal for a girl your age."

You listened carefully to what the doctor said. He draw breath again "We also did a check on your chromosomes, and made another discovery. Your upper body has the XY combination, meaning that you are in all aspects a male. From your waist down however, you have an XX combination, which is that of a girl. For whatever reason, these two exists at the same time but don't interact, leaving your 50 % male and 50 % female."

You understood what the doctor was saying, but had trouble figuring out what it meant. "So how did this happen in the first place?" you asked. "To this, we have no answer. Your two X-chromosomes explains why you have female anatomy, it does not however explain how it came to happen. Like I said earlier, taking hormone supplements causes your body to go through some physical changes, but it doesn't cause a complete sex-change. Having surgery to alter your sex doesn't change your chromosomes either. You are in all aspects a girl down there, Mr. Henderson".

You were starting to feel anxious. "Please, there must be something you can do about this. How long will I have this.. thing?"
"The changes seemed to remain limited to your lower body, though I'm sorry Mark. These changes seem to be permanent"

This was what you had been afraid of the whole time. You had just found out that you would remain a girl for the rest of your life.
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: The doctor came back with your results

1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: Continue

This morning you had felt positive that the doctor's would locate the problem and be able to fix it. Coming home, you felt as depressed as the first day when these changes first occured. You were going to be 50 % female, for the rest of your life. You would never be able to stand up and pee again. What girl would want to date a boy with a vagina? 1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.content:
You went home. You had pondered the idea of calling Amanda but felt like you needed some time alone first to process these news. How could this happen? Not even a bunch of trained doctor's knew! All they knew is that you would be stuck like this, for the rest of your life. Never again would you be a guy 100 %.

You decided to put on some other clothes. Your doctor's visit was over, and these underwear didn't quite fit. You removed your jeans, and your underwear. Pulling them on, they felt kind of like the skinny jeans you had tried on earlier, though much softer and flexible. They outlined your body even more than the jeans, and they shaped themselves around you like a second skin.

Walking back to your room, you noticed you had a pair of missed messages on your phone. Apparently you had slept like a log tonight.
One message was from your dad, asking if you wanted to come home next week for your brother's birthday. This you hadn't forgotten, but your priorities had of course been altered due to everything going on in your own life.

The next was from Amanda, who seemed to have recalled your doctor's appointment yesterday and asked how it went. You first replied to your dad, saying you would do your best to show up. After all, you hadn't seen your parents or your two little brothers for a month. Family was a big thing in your life, though it gets a bit complicated to visit them on a regular basis as you have an apartment on your own.

Not wanting to write all of this via text, just out of the fear that someone else would read the text message, you decided to call her up. A few dialing tones into the phonecall she answered. "Hello?" said a tired voice. "Hi, are you awake?" you replied. "Well, I am now" Amanda said, yawning on the other end.

"Sorry, I didn't see your message until now"
"Nah, that's okay, she said. I was supposed to get up soon anyways" she said. "So how did it go yesterday?"
You took a little breath. You had received these news, but actually hearing you say them gave a little extra sense of reality to them. "Not that good. At this, you heard Amanda snort on the other side of the line, trying to hold back a sudden burst of laughter. "Sorry" she said, still apparently trying to hold back her laughter a bit. "And?"

"So what does that mean? How did it happen? Will it spread? How long will you have it till it goes away?" she said.
"That's the thing. It shouldn't be able to happen. They have no idea how the changes happened in the first place, but they atleast guessed it wouldn't spread." You took a deep breath. "But, he said the changes seem to be permanent"

"So what now?" Amanda said after a few seconds, now sounding serious.
"So now.. I guess I have to start learning what it's like to be a girl for real" you said.

You heard a voice in the backgorund of the call. "Who are you talking to, Amanda?"
"I'm talking to Mark!" you heard Amanda shouting back. It was Amanda's mom who had asked. Being one of Amanda's closest friends, you had met her family more than once. The rest of the morning went by at a normal pace. When there was a familiar knock on the door you walked over there to find the guys waiting outside.

You flinched in your seat. "Do they know who?" you said, doing your best to keep calm. "No. They won't reveal his identity" said John.

1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: The guys come over

1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.content:
Has the news really spread this far already? you thought, a little worried.

Carl gave a little laugh. "Whether or not it's some sort of hoax, could you imagine the horror of having that happening to you?"
"Wouldn't it be cool at the same time?" said John. "Experiencing what it's like to be the other sex"

He seemed to be pondering this. "Besides-" you added, "what would you do? tell your friends? your family? your girlfriend?"
While you were on the subject, you thought you might as well get some questions out there, as they didn't actually know it was you they were talking about.
"Hahah, exactly. However 'fun' it would be for a while, I think you'd still freak out because of it and try to hide it" said Rob.

The rest of the group however seemed to be stuck in the Hollywood delusion of that it would pan out like the plot for Freaky Friday or It's a Boy Girl Thing where the character easily comes to terms with the changes at hand. You knew this wasn't quite what happens. You freaked out, you went to the doctor's, and now you were forced to live the rest of your life with female genitalia and science couldn't even explain why. Hadn't it been for Amanda, you'd be completely lost.
The guys were your best friends, apart from her. As of now, you weren't going to tell them anything as you had no idea how they would react. In that regard you think girls are more accepting, while guys would probably think your new genitalia automatically makes you gay or something.
Of course you knew that wasn't the case. You still liked girls just as much as before, apart from the fact that you now pretty much are one yourself.

Would they really think differently of you? You had no idea. Atleast if you told them, they wouldn't think you were making fun of them like Amanda did. This time the news were out and people now knew that this was the real deal.

You shut down the wii and went to the kitchen to prepare some dinner. Your fridge was almost empty as your focus hadn't exactly been set on shopping, lately. Compared to the jeans or even the leggings, this was as far from skintight as you could go. Instead, it almost felt too revealing. It wasn't some fancy tight skirt stopping as soon as your ass did. This evening seemed to pass rather slow compared to the rest. You did some homework and tried to entertain yourself in other ways. The feeling of having a vagina rather than a penis grew more familiar for every day; not having something in front of you, to be all-flat. Apart from the genitalia, you could also feel certain other differences as your whole bottom half had changed, too. You felt more agile and your shape felt different with your wide hips and curvier legs. You felt that when you walked, you walked in a more feminine manner by automatically swaying your hips a bit more than you would've with your masculine features.

You finally decided to go to bed. Like you usually did, you left your underwear on when you slept. One pro you had found of all this, was that it was more comfortable to lie on your stomach while sleeping. There was nothing to get in the way, so to speak.
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: The rest of the evening

1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.content:
Monday. It was time for school again. You woke up to the sound of your alarm clock at 7:00 and slowly rolled out of bed. Things had started to head into a routine. You got up, went to the bathroom, then you got into the shower. This was more or less the same things you had done almost every day the past week, and the past few years before that (only now you did it with a few new features).

When getting dressed you tried to build up a scenario in your mind, to help decide whether you should wear male or female underwear to school. You settled on female underwear, almost having gotten used to the feel of them. These didn't leave any space for stuffing so that your crotch would look "fuller", but you decided to try it nevertheless. The guys hadn't noticed anything yesterday, and you didn't want to have to stuff a pair of underwear everytime you went outside your apartment.
You pulled on a pair of regular pants, now having to get used to the feeling of wearing male clothing again. You had taken the opportunity to try out a bunch of girlclothes during the weekend just to see if it was something for you, but as school started again it meant you got to wear your regular clothes again.

As far as you could tell, there was no reason anyone would notice anything different as long as they didn't actually grab you in the crotch.
- And as far as you could tell, there was no reason anyone would do that.

After having breakfast you grabbed your jacket and your backpack and went out the door.
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: The next morning

1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.content:
On your way to school you crossed paths with John. Like Amanda, he didn't live more than a few blocks away from your house. The two of you walked the last bit together before arriving at your school.
The corridor seemed pretty much normal. Students talking to their friends, some people running because they were about to arrive late or that minority of people that were screaming and making a racket.

John quickly left his stuff and went ahead to your classroom, leaving you alone at your locker. He was the type that always aimed for the highest grades and so forth, so he didn't want to get late. Your class however didn't start for another five minutes. You opened up your locker, threw in your bag and your jacket and picked out your books. As you were about to head to class, you met Amanda and her friends Jessica and Emily. Like Amanda knew John, Rob and Carl rather well, you also got along rather well with her friends. "Oh, hey Mark" she said as you had almost bumped into each other. "Hey, you're back?" you said. "Yeah. How's your head?" Amanda replied. It took you a second to realize what she was talking about. She was using the collision you had at gym as a codeword for asking you how you had felt after the doctor's visit. "My head? Oh. Well, a bit shaken but I'm actually fine" you said, following the girls up the stairs to your classroom.
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: You go to school

1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.content:
"Your head still hurts after the collision in gymclass last week?" Emily asked a little surprised. You tried to keep the 'codewords' going. "Well, it was probably the worst during the first day, but I went to the doctor's this weekend to get it checked out and he said I'll experience some symptoms a little longer than I thought. I almost think I'm starting to get used to though".
Amanda gave a hint of a little smile in all of this, while also seeming surprised.
This was actually true. For every day that passed, you were getting more and more used to your new anatomy and new assets. You didn't think you'd ever be glad it happened, and you'd probably keep wishing it went away. Like the with the man who loses his arm though, even though you don't approve of that it happened, you kind of learn to live without it.

It seemed weird to look at a girl on the streets or at school, thinking she looked attractive - then thinking "Remember, you look the same underneath your clothes". These changes had gotten you thinking that it takes more than your physical appearance to define what sex you identify as. You had a vagina and not a penis, though you still had the mind of a guy. You had no more interest in girl-stuff than you did before, so in your head - you still felt you were a boy.
A boy that knew what it felt like to be a girl.
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: Continue

1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.content:
"So Mark, have you planned on going to the school dance next week?" said Jessica. You had completely forgot about this. You were actually thinking of asking Amanda the very same day the incident happened. Now? You doubt she would go with you given the fact that you're wearing what used to be her underwear at this very moment. Most likely your odds with any woman has decreased drastically because of it. You gave "I don't know yet" as a reply.

The classroom was open, so you and the girls split up and took a seat at your bench (like most students already had). The teacher and the rest of the class arrived shortly after. This class was rather dull in your opinion and you felt like drifting off on several occasions. English was usually something you enjoyed. That and math. When you got bored during the weekend however, you had already finished the chapter you were going to work on today, leaving you with nothing to do.

Feeling good to meet other people rather than locking yourself into your apartment like you did this weekend, you kind of enjoyed school today. The rest of the day did on the other hand pass as slowly as the first class did. One class after the next, the teacher talking and not really much else. During lunch it was made clear that the guys weren't the only ones having read the paper earlier, as a few discussions had errupted concerning the guy who had become a girl. No one had at this point tried making any conclusions about who it was, just that it was a scientific discovery no one thought was possible. This was probably an eminent difference between high school and college. Here, people (however childish they may be sometimes) acted more mature than they probably would have if they were still in high school. You tried not to weigh in during these conversations, but some discussions were actually fun listening too, one of them having made all of you laugh during lunch. Guys thinking it would either mean the end of the world if it had happened to them, or guys thinking it would be great to see a naked girl at any time. The girls were making jokes themselves, as well as saying it wasn't bad being a girl. Nevertheless it still felt good when the bell rang at the end of the day.

Amanda walked up to you as most of the other students had already left the classroom, asking you if you wanted to do something today.
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: Your first class

1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.content:
You picked up your backpack and hung it over your shoulder. "Sure!" you said. "Where at? My place?"
"We could go to my place today. My family are over at my grandmas, so I'm home alone till seven-ish tonight."
You would have much rather been at your place, but since she was home alone you didn't really have anything to side against the idea. "Alright" you said as you walked out.

On your way home, she started talking. "So, you're getting used to the 'blow you got to the head huh?" she said, jokingly bumping your shoulder.
"Well" you said. - "I don't exactly like it, but you can't help to get used to it after a while. You know what I mean?"
"Hahah, yeah I get it. So what do you think of the fact that everyone else seems to know now?"
"Well.. I'm just glad they didn't call anyone out. Though I think you would've been easier to convinced had you known it was possible from the beginning"
"Don't be so sure" she said and smiled.
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: Yes

1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.content:
As Amanda unlocked the door to her house, she gave out a "Hello?" to see if anyone was there. There was no reply.
You removed your backpack, jacket and your shoes and followed Amanda upstairs to her room. "Getting used to it huh?" she said while running up the stairs. Both of you seemed to have gotten to the part where you could talk more casually about it without either of you finding it all that weird weird.

Sitting down in her room, you replied. "Hahah, a little bit. Once you sort if out the routine kind of sticks. I don't like it any more than I did my first day, but it sort of gets more and more 'normal' by the day. It's like that with anything I guess. Do something a set number of times and it starts feeling more normal"

Amanda sat with her legs crossed in her bed, looking at you. "So witch do you prefer? I'm guessing that you would rather get back to normal if it was possible, right?" you nodded. "But just by going by what seems better, not going into what you think you should be - do you prefer boy or girl?"
You weren't really prepared for this question. "I uh.. I don't know. I've only thought that I want things to go back to normal" Amanda changed her position and said "Let's put it this way then, have you experienced any pros and cons since the change?"
Amanda tried to induce more casual talk about this, probably being curious herself as she (apart from the doctors and yourself) were the only ones who knew it was you the media had been blabbing about lately.

You gave this some thought based on the things you had experienced the week before. "There is nothing down there that gets in the way. I noticed a few days ago that if I lie on my stomach or something, there's nothing that gets "squashed". Probably the same if I were to get accidentally hit or kicked down there" You tried to keep the language as clean as possible, feeling awkward about talking about male genitalia with Amanda. "Had you had the upper body of a girl, too though, you would've had something else in the way" she said, pointing at her chest. You laughed. You supposed that in that regard, you had the best thing with female genitalia and male chest. Nothing to get in the way on either places.

"Anything else?" she said. "Uuhm.. Well, I hate having to sit down every time I go to the bathroom. And I think the clothes are way too tight and revealing." Amanda didn't agree on the clothes part. "I think they're much more comfortable than I imagine guy clothes being. Besides, it doesn't seem to be that bad" she said, pointing at your pants. Your shirt had slid up a bit, revealing the waistband of the panties you were wearing. "Well, the underwear are alright" you said.
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: Arriving at her house

choices: You go to the mall right away
You go to the mall some other day
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.content:
Amanda smirked. "So are you cool with being stuck like this permanently?" she said.
"Of course I'm not" you said, this time losing a bit of the friendliness of your voice. "I'm stuck like this, for the rest of my life. Had I been back to normal, or heck, even become a girl 100 %, I wouldn't have be stuck like some freak who's half and half".

"There's no need to shout at me" said Amanda, now also losing a bit of her normally friendly tone. "I'm sorry" you said. "I just don't think I'll ever be prepared to live the rest of my life like this" you said. "I've already told you, I'll try to help you out" said Amanda. She leaned over and gave you a hug.

Once again looking at the hinting of your underwear, she turned to you and said "I think you need to get more clothes if you aren't going to get back to normal"
You looked at Amanda. For her this would've been easy. She's a girl. She's all girl. The norm for her was the stuff you had yet to accept. You had received clothes from her and even started wearing it at home. That didn't mean you were okay with being seen at the mall with a pile of girlclothes, going into a changing room. You did your best at explaining this to her. "Hey, I get it" she said. "But trust me, you can't live for the rest of your life with like five pairs of underwear and two pairs of pants, Mark". She did have a point.

She had asked how the clothes she had given you fit, and you told her that despite your dislike for the tightness of it all, you think they are the right size. You later agreed to go to the mall together. You would give her money, and she would buy you clothes as you seemed to share the same sizes.
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: Continue

1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.content:
"So when do you want go to?" said Amanda. "I don't really WANT to go, but if you think it's necessary then I'm probably free any day of the week." Amanda nodded. After this conversation, the room turned rather quiet. You pondered a bit for the next thing to say, but didn't really come up with anything. She had already asked you about clothes and about how you coped with it. You didn't really feel like you had anything you wanted to bring up either.

"Amanda.."
"Yes?"
You didn't really know where to begin, because you had no idea what you were about to say. "Before any of this happened - and please, don't hate me" Amanda looked puzzled. "What are you talking about?"
"Before any of this happened, actually it was the very same day, I was planning on.. I was planning on asking you to the dance"

You knew Amanda had heard what you said, but it didn't look like she did. She gave no response, and you couldn't tell anything from the expression of her face. The house was dead-quiet. All that could be heard was the sound of a clock, ticking in the livingroom. The suspense was killing you, and you had no idea why you even brought this up in the first place. Still looking distant, Amanda finally looked up as her gaze met your own. "So what.." she started. "Amanda, I.. I like you. A lot.."

Amanda said nothing to this. She didn't even look at you, she just remained silent as she stepped out of her bed and got to her feet. That stupid clock in the livingroom was still the only thing making a sound, and you felt as if it was mocking you. Why did you have to open your big mouth? Why, after all this time, did you have to open your big fat mouth and tell Amanda that you liked her?
Amanda was gently walking a bit back and forth in her room, her eyes still avoiding you. She finally came to a stop, her face looking out of the window. "Mark.."
Before she could say anything, you interrupted her. Whatever she was about to say, you were sure it wasn't the good news you had always dreamed of.
"Please, Amanda. Forget I said anything" you mumbled. "I should probably go". She grabbed your arm as you got up. "No Mark, I just-"
"It's okay" you said, as you slowly walked out the door to her bedroom.
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: You go to the mall some other day

choices: In the middle of the night
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.content:
You just wanted to get out of there. Amanda wasn't following you, she didn't do anything. As you were about to leave, you went silent for a second. Now, accompanied by the sound of the livingroom clock, you heard the sound of Amanda crying from her bedroom. You left.

This was wrong. WHY did you have to do this? You were friends. Amanda was your best friend, and now you had probably lost her forever. With every step you took you felt more and more sad and angry yourself. She didn't like you back. The girl you had liked for years didn't like you back. - And you had just left her there, crying. You felt like you were the worst person alive. Your whole life has been ruined in under a week, only because of the STUPID changes that had occured. You hated it. You hated it with a burning passion. You hated having to hide it from everyone, you hated having to cope with something you didn't ask for, and you hated having hurt the person you loved most in the world.

As you got home, you threw off your shoes and your jacket, you locked the door and turned off the lights. You undressed, planning on going to bed even though it was still daytime. You didn't care. You took a stop as you walked by the mirror in your room. You took a good look at yourself. Your chest, your face, your arms - they were all parts of a boy. Your lower half; your legs, your hips, your crotch - they were all parts of what had come to destroy your life.

You didn't ask for any of this, you thought as you lay down in bed. You looked down at the underwear you were wearing. You hated it. You hated all of it. You removed the panties and looked at them, before finally deciding to rip them apart. You walked over to your closet and put on a pair of male boxers, thinking "I'm a boy. I'm not a girl, I'm supposed to be a boy" You threw every item of female clothing on the floor, ready to break them too. You suddenly came to a stop. This was a pile of clothes Amanda had given you to help you out. Every single item here was something she had given you to help you cope with these changes, and you were just about to ruin it.

As your anger started to diminish, you finally broke down crying yourself - then finally falling asleep.
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: Continue

choices: You met up with the guys
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.content:
You awoke in your bed. Your alarmclock was ringing. Your head felt heavy, but you managed to pull yourself up. Walking into the livingroom, you could still see the pile of clothes helplessly lying on the floor as they had yesterday. You felt nothing but regret for what you had done the night before, so you started packing the items back in the closet. You kept the boxers on, as you wanted to wear them as a reminder to yourself that you were still yourself - and that these changes wouldn't change your life, no matter how hard you tried.

Your head, despite the headache, felt much clearer today. You got dressed and had some breakfast. As soon as you got to school, you would find Amanda, and you would fix this. She was your best friend, and without her help you would never have..

You thought back to the day before. You had told her about your feelings, then you had just stormed off and left her crying.
As you got to school, you more or less ignored everyone else. You found Emily down along the corridor, so you went up to her. "Emily, have you seen Amanda? I really need to talk to her"
"She's not here" Emily replied. "I texted her a few minutes ago, she said she was sick"
"Okay.. thanks"
"What's going on, Mark?"
"Nothing. I just... It's nothing" you said, walking away.
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: The next morning

1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.content:
Amanda wasn't at school, but she wasn't sick. She had stayed at home in an attempt to avoid you, you knew that. You picked up your phone in an attempt to call her instead.
*Beep* ... *Beep* ... *Beep* "Come on, pick up" you said, well aware of the fact that she couldn't hear you.

Eventually you heard a voice on the other end. You started "Amanda, I"
"Hi! You've reached Amanda Turner. If you hear this message than I can't answer right now. Leave a message after the beep!"
"Amanda, it's Mark. Please, call me back when you get this message" you said.

It was pointless. You gave up for the moment being and hurried to your first class so you wouldn't be late. Everyone was still waiting outside, meaning the teacher hadn't arrived yet. You walked up to John, Rob and Carl who were standing in front of the lockers next to the door. "Good morning" you said. "Mornin'. Rough day?" you nodded. "I saw you running off as soon as you got here. What's up, Mark?" said John.
At that moment the teacher arrived and people started streaming in.
"I'll tell you later" you said, following the rest of the students into the classroom.
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: You tried calling Amandas cellphone

1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.content:
When the bell finally rang, you went down to your locker to leave your things. You followed the guys (and the rest of the class) to the cafeteria to grab some lunch. The food at your school wasn't actually that bad, compared to the horrible thing they called nourishment at your old high school. As usual, your class sat together at a long table. The conversations weren't as wild as yesterday's speculations about men turning into girls. The media had stayed silent about it since the article's first appearance in the paper, though you weren't sure why. Maybe it was more interesting in the scientific world than for normal people who had no knowledge as to how it could have originated. Though the scientists, of course, couldn't answer that question either.

Leaving the cafeteria, the guys took you aside. "So what's up, Mark?"
You had already forgotten that you promised to tell them about everything that had happened the day before. "Alright" you said and took a deep breath. "I told Amanda I'm in love with her"

"Finally!" they exclaimed. You hadn't told them about it yourself, but through the years they had probably picked up the hints. "So what did she say?"
You went quiet for a second. "Nothing. She was quiet for a long time, and finally I left. Now she won't return my calls, and she evidentely 'called in sick' for school today." The others seemed confused. "I honestly thought she liked you back" John said, seeming to beat the others to that reply. "It was a long shot" you said. - "And I regret that I ever told her. I think our friendship might be over."

You weren't used to talking about this lovey-dobey feeling-stuff with them, but in this situation it felt like it helped. Call it a stereotype or whatever you want, but you guys didn't usually have these types of conversations. "Go home to her after school and see if she will talk to you in person" Rob said. The others agreed. "I don't know.." you replied. "Come on Mark, grow a pair!"
In your mind you laughed a bit at the irony of that statement. "Fine, I'll try."
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: At lunch

1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.content:
"You can keep going" you said "I've gotta go to the bathroom real quick".
Both John and Carl came with you, as they too had to go. As you entered the men's bathroom, you realized this was the first time you had gone here since you had experienced the sudden 'transformation'. The stall's were all taken, so they took a place at the urinal instead.
"Hurry, class starts in five" they said as you anxiously just stood there. "You go ahead, I'll wait for a stall"

They left.

It was another few minutes before someone else left. You went into the stall and locked the door. To the surface the toilet looked pretty clean, but you knew that it probably wasn't as clean as it looked. You covered the toilet seat in paper before sitting down. "Another pro of being a guy down there" you thought while doing your business.

At math-class the teacher had already arrived, though she didn't appear to have been there for long. You went to your seat as she called your name.
There was nothing special about this class. No special group-assignment or walkthrough on a new chapter, it was just a continuing-where-you-left-off type of lesson. You had an early day, meaning this was your last class. When it was over, the guys walked past you while patting you on the shoulder, wishing you good luck.
"Good luck with what?" said Emily and Katy, who, apart from you, were the last people who hadn't finished packing up their stuff. Katy was another friend of Amanda's, though she had been sick since the week before. She was normally really friendly, though she had shoved you aside on your way to gym-class last week. She was probably just stressed out or having a bad day.

Before you had replied the two girls, Rob walked back a few paces and said "He told Amanda he had a crush on her, last night and he's heading back there now".
- ROB! you exclaimed.
"Don't worry" Katy said. "It's really obvious that you like her, besides; You're really cute together"

"In what way is it obvious? Did she know too?"
"Not to our knowledge. Though in her defense, you haven't seemed to notice that she obviously cares about you, too"
Your heart stopped. "If that was true" you said - "then things wouldn't have gone like they did last night".
"Why? What happened?" said Emily.
"I don't want to go into details" you replied.

You had finished packing your bag. You hung it over your shoulder and started walking out of the classroom. "See you tomorrow" you said.
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: Math class

1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.content:
You weren't sure you believed them when they said Amanda likes you back. In fact, how could you? You had left her crying in her room yesterday, and now she doesn't return your calls. It doesn't sound like a happily ever after, does it?

Finally you arrived to her house. You raised your hand to knock, then hesitated. Is her parents home or are they working? The place looked dark. You raised your hand again and knocked on the door.
There was a moment of silence, then you heard footsteps. Finally Amanda's younger sister opened the door.
"Hi Mark!" she said. She was only five years old and one of the cutest and friendliest kids you'd ever meet.
"Hi, Alicia!" you said, kneeling down. "Is your sister at home?"
Alicia gave a big nod in the way that young kids normally do. "She's in her room"

You stepped inside. Her parents seemed to be at work, probably suggesting Amanda was babysitting. You walked up the staircase till you reached the door to her room. You gave three solid knocks, without saying a word. Finally the door opened.
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: Going to Amanda's house

1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.content:
Amanda stood there and looked at you. She wasn't sick, that was for sure. She didn't look angry, either. She just calmly waved her hand and said "Come in" as she shut the door behind you.

She really was cute. Her hair was wavy, and she was wearing a bright blouse together with a pair of white jeans.
"Amanda, I want to apologize for everything I did yesterday. I wasn't planning on telling you, it just kind of slipped out. - And I certainly wasn't planning on hurting you." you said.

Amanda seemed neither angry nor sad. She seemed rather.. neutral.
"I'm not mad at you for telling me." she said in a really calm voice. "As a matter of fact, I like you too, Mark. Of course I like you." she said.

This time your heart skipped a beat. Amanda, the girl who is your best friend, likes you back. Amanda, the girl you've had a crush on for several years, has a crush on you too!
"Then why did you.." you started

She got to her feet, as she had done yesterday. "It's complicated, Mark. Had this been a week ago, it probably wouldn't have ended like it did yesterday"
You took a deep sigh, knowing where she was going with this.
"I really like you Mark, but everything is so weird right now. When I see your face, I see my best friend, and the boy I like. When I imagine what's down there..."

You felt more sad than you could have imagined yourself feeling. Your dream girl liked you back, but because of an incident you didn't ask for, because of things you didn't want, you can't be together? "Amanda, I didn't want this to happen. Had I any choice in the matter, I would want this removed!"
"I know you would, Mark. It's just so.. complicated." She stopped pacing around the room and sat down next to you. She took your hand, and you stroked hers. The seconds you sat there felt like minutes.
"I'm just not sure how we could make this work" she said.

That's when it happened. You can't tell who initiated it, but it happened. You were staring at Amanda's beautiful eyes, and she was staring back at yours. Without a word, you slowly started leaning into it. You didn't have any time to think, and you didn't want to think. Both of you closed your eyes as your lips met, and finally, you kissed.
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: Come in

choices: After school you and Amanda are going to the mall
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.content:
Your name is Mark Henderson. You're 18 years old, and for the first time in your life you had kissed the girl you had been in love with for years. Amanda Turner had been your best friend since fifth grade, and she still is.

After the two of you kissed yesterday, you had been in hooked on a feeling of euphoria for the rest of the day. Yet, things were complicated. Around a week ago, for reasons not even medicine has been able to provide answers for, your body had changed. From the waist down, you had naturally acquired the assets of the other sex. Your genitalia, your legs, your bum and everything else has somehow been altered into that of a girl.

Amanda knew this. That's why it was complicated. She had confessed that she had feelings for you too, but due to obvious reasons things were getting complicated. She had been really supportive in trying to aid you in these sudden (and bizarre) lifechanges, yet it put a definite roadblock in the relationship you could've shared. Yet she kissed you. These thoughts didn't drop out of your head. Had it been the heat of the moment? Could the two of you somehow make this work?

Today it was wednesday. Tomorrow it was the one week anniversary since you reluctantly received these changes. It had been a weird first few days, yet you had begun to differentiate the different stages of crisis. The prodromal stage which was the inital shock you received the first day. The acute crisis stage in which you had atleast accepted that it had happened, even if you didn't like it. Right now you felt yourself entering the crisis resolution stage in which you still hated what had happened to you, but you had begun to re-enter your normal life.

It had been confusing to suddenly have to learn how to deal with being a girl. It felt different, it looked different. Amanda had been super supportive in providing you with a few pieces of clothing, giving you advice and in keeping it a secret. You had gone to the doctor's and looked it up and everything appears healthy, yet the changes are deemed to be permanent.
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.title: Continue

choices: You run into the guys on your way there
1121312212222122111211111111111111121111.content:
A few days ago Amanda had told you that you need to get more clothes, knowing you would have to live with this. The few pairs of panties and other items weren't enough for you to actually live on, according to her own knowing. She had come up with the idea that the two of you should go to the mall and acquire some new clothes. Given that you seemed to be around the same size, she would accompany you, give you advice and help pick out an array of clothing that you would pay for. You hadn't talked to her since you left last night and you didn't know what to say of it. Still, imagine yourself going to the store with your best (female) friend and ask for her help to buy you girl clothes. This has awkward written all over it.

At the sound of the bell after school you waited for her by the entrance. You didn't have to wait for long as she was just going down to the lockers to grab her bag. At first you didn't say anything. You walked next to each other without a word. "Soo about yesterday" you started. She looked at you. "Yeah.. That was something" she said, just as awkward. Both of you laughed briefly. info.description:
Your name is Mark Henderson, 18. You are an average guy in your last year of highschool. You are overall rather thin though your belly has gotten bigger over the last few years. You are best friends with Amanda Turner and have been since 5th grade. You've wanted to ask her out on a date for a little while but have been worried of ruining your friendship. Overall you have a rather average life until...

One day you morph one of your physical traits into the trait of someone else.

Rules:
1. Only one morph
2. No killing off characters
3. Good Grammar
4. No personality changes
5. Only morph with a person that the main character knows or can see in real life (not magazine, TV, etc.)

Note: In any point where the morph may occur, try to allow a choice for the morph to wait until later
Also: morphs can be very complex but never a full body morph and never involving more than one person.
